members.member:
This class provides several methods for managing the relation between an object (e.g. a window) and the source code that will implement the code for that object.
Once created, a CodeBinder object will keep track of the class bound to the object. If the class is renamed, it will properly update the object name.
Synchronizes the bindings between the object and the source code
Adds a signal handler to the class
Adds a field to the class
